EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Pivotal/DSC_Roundtable_Q116.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Live Roundtable: The Past, Present and Future of Data Science
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1108772/C10F6303F28225E39101CABEF4F4BB6B?partnerref=Pivotal?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=dsc-webinar-1-12-16]]> Tuesday, January 12, 2016 9:00 AM PST REGISTER <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1108772/C10F6303F28225E39101CABEF4F4BB6B?partnerref=Pivotal?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=dsc-webinar-1-12-16]]> The next Pivotal and Data Science Central webinar <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1108772/C10F6303F28225E39101CABEF4F4BB6B?partnerref=Pivotal?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=dsc-webinar-1-12-16]]> will include a live roundtable discussion with members of the Pivotal Data Science team. This unique event provides attendees a full hour to interact with an elite panel and learn from their years of real-world experience.
The panelists will discuss their journeys to becoming data scientists, some of the projects they are currently working on, as well as how they see the field of data science evolving in the years to come.
Join us <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1108772/C10F6303F28225E39101CABEF4F4BB6B?partnerref=Pivotal?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=dsc-webinar-1-12-16]]> for a rare opportunity to engage with this talented group in an open discussion, which will flow organically and as directed by those that attend.
